Columns

columns.Rmd
library(northstar)
library(dplyr)

Look Up HCPCS Code 

calc_amounts_df(hcpcs    = "11646", 
                state    = "GA", 
                locality = "99", 
                mac      = "10212") |> 
  glimpse()
